definitions.definition: The quality or state of being peculiar ; individuality; singularity.
examples: The peculiarity of meeting six people on a usually deserted trail only struck me later on.

definitions.definition: That which is peculiar; a special and distinctive characteristic or habit; particularity.

main_definition: The quality or state of being peculiar ; individuality; singularity.
secondary_definitions: That which is peculiar; a special and distinctive characteristic or habit; particularity.
